movies.title: Lili la petite sorcière: Le voyage vers Mandolan
movies.originalTitle: Hexe Lilli: Die Reise nach Mandolan
movies.plot: Lilli is traveling to India, to solve a mystery.
movies.simplePlot: Lilli is traveling to India, to solve a mystery.

biography.bio: Alina Freund was born on October 2, 1997 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. She is an actress, known for Lili la petite sorcière, le dragon et le livre magique (2009), Lili la petite sorcière: Le voyage vers Mandolan (2011) and Ausgerechnet Weihnachten (2005).
biography.name: Alina Freund

biography.bio: Tanay Hemant Chheda is an Indian child actor. He is best known for his performances in the critically acclaimed films Taare Zameen Par (Like Stars on Earth) (2007) and Slumdog Millionaire (2008), with the latter earning him the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture and a nomination for Best Ensemble at the Black Reel Awards of 2008. He was first seen in the movie, Don, in 2006. He also has the critically acclaimed Taare Zameen Par (Like Stars on Earth) in 2007 to his name and the award-sweeping Slumdog Millionaire in 2008. In Don, he played the role of Deepu, the son of Jasjit (played by Arjun Rampal) . In Taare Zameen Par, he played the role of a handicapped child who is an extremely helpful and supportive friend to the protagonist Ishaan (played by Darsheel Safary). In Slumdog Millionaire, Chheda played the role of Jamal Malik, in adolescence, for which he has won the Screen Actors Guild Award for Outstanding Performance by a Cast in a Motion Picture and received a nomination for Best Ensemble at the Black Reel Awards of 2008. He has most recently portrayed the young Rizwan Khan, an autistic child, in Shahrukh Khan's film, My Name Is Khan. He was nominated for the best child actor in Star Screen Awards for 'My Name Is Khan'. He was last seen in a German film Hexe Lilli- Journey to Mandolan which released on 13 February 2011.
biography.name: Tanay Chheda

biography.bio: Michael Mittermeier was born on April 3, 1966 in Dorfen, Bavaria, Germany. He is a writer and actor, known for Michael Mittermeier: Zapped! (1999), Die Harald Schmidt Show (1995) and Mittermeiers Saturday Night Live (2004). He has been married to Gudrun Allwang since December 1998. They have one child.
biography.name: Michael Mittermeier

biography.bio: Pilar Bardem was born on March 14, 1939 in Seville, Seville, Andalucía, Spain as Pilar Bardem Muñoz. She is an actress, known for Love in Difficult Times (2005), Live Flesh (1997) and Abierto 24 horas (2000).
biography.name: Pilar Bardem

biography.bio: Ercan Durmaz was born on August 16, 1965 in Istanbul, Turkey. He is an actor, known for Pour une poignée d'herbe (2000), Sophiiiie! (2002) and Was nicht passt wird passend gemacht (2003).
biography.name: Ercan Durmaz

biography.bio: Jürgen Tarrach was born on December 17, 1960 in Geilenkirchen, Germany. He is an actor, known for Casino Royale (2006), The Reader (2008) and Die Musterknaben (1997).
biography.name: Jürgen Tarrach

biography.bio: Albert Pérez is an actor, known for Le parfum - Histoire d'un meurtrier (2006), Porca misèria (2004) and Sitges (1996).
biography.name: Albert Pérez

biography.bio: Pegah Ferydoni was born on June 25, 1983 in Tehran, Iran. She is an actress, known for Family Mix (2006), Women without men (2009) and Türkisch für Anfänger (2012).
biography.name: Pegah Ferydoni

biography.bio: Michael Mendl was born on April 20, 1944 in Lünen, Germany as Michael Sandrock. He is an actor, known for Downfall (2004), Barefoot (2005) and 14 jours à perpétuité (1997).
biography.name: Michael Mendl

biography.bio: Anja Kling was born on March 22, 1970 in Potsdam, German Democratic Republic. She is an actress and writer, known for Space Movie: La menace fantoche (2004), The Final Days (2008) and Wo ist Fred? (2006).
biography.name: Anja Kling

biography.bio: Miguel Wansing Lorrio was born in 2001. He is an actor, known for Freifall (2012), Die Könige der Straße (2011) and Mother 007 (2011).
biography.name: Miguel Wansing Lorrio

biography.bio: Cosma Shiva Hagen was born on May 17, 1981 in Los Angeles, California, USA. She is an actress, known for Love Scenes from Planet Earth (1998), Speed Racer (2008) and Bible code (2008).
biography.name: Cosma Shiva Hagen

biography.bio: Badasar Colbiyik was born in 1974 as Badasar Calbiyik. He is an actor, known for Kebab Connection (2004), Die rote Zora (2008) and Hier kommt: Lola (2010).
biography.name: Badasar Colbiyik

biography.bio: Ulrich Frank is an actor, known for Jester Till (2003), Ritter Rost - Eisenhart und voll verbeult (2013) and Habermann (2010).
biography.name: Ulrich Frank

biography.bio: Born in Andorra la Vella on June 20, 1979. Actor, director and film editor in 2014 decided to build his own production company, LasProduccionesDeRupert (RupertFilms). As an actor he has worked on feature films as "Dirty Wolves" (Simon Casal 2015), "The Last Days" (David and Alex Pastor 2013), "El Cónsul de Sodoma" (Sigfrid Monleón 2009), "Dos Fragmentos / Eva" (Angel Santos 2009), "Rhesus" (Carles Torrents tvmovie-2009), "Trash" (Carles Torras 2008), "Serrallonga" (tvmovie-2008), "Zulo" (Carlos Martin 2004) and "Mi Dulce" (Jesus Mora (2000).
biography.name: Isak Férriz
